channel.title: GitHub on Study Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Study Blog

item.title: How to Upload my Blog to Github
item.description: How to Upload my Blog to Github Upload local server hugo server -t hugo-theme-stack --buildDrafts Use http://localhost:1313/ to check. Upload to my Github hugo --theme=hugo-theme-stack --baseUrl="https://Eason366.github.io/" --buildDrafts #Create web page cd public #Enter the public folder git add . git commit -m "commit" git push -u origin master Use https://eason366.github.io/ to check. Creat a new Blog hugo new post/#BlogName.md
